issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: AbstractYarnScheduler.createReleaseCache may try to clean a null attempt

Nice catch [~nijel]. Thanks for working on this.

Can you add a test to cover this change? Thanks.

Thanks [~devaraj.k] for the review
Test case looks bit tricky :)
i will update the patch soon.
You can possibly extract the code contained in the run() as a test scope method in the AbstractYarnScheduler class and then you can add test for the new method.

Thanks [~devaraj.k] for the suggestion
Updated patch with test case
Please review
Submitting Patch to run the Jenkins.
